root.message: The DOC_METHOD field for indicator 17-19-1, translated into en
root.data: 2016 Partner Report on Support to Statistics (PRESS) published by PARIS21 (www.paris21.org/press) based on data from Creditor Reporting System (https://stats.oecd.org/Index.aspx?DataSetCode=CRS1) and PARIS21 PRESS online survey.
